Please upload pictures of each classroom as per defined sections. In Classroom view, take 2 pictures of each classroom. Picture should depict entire area. Please upload pictures of following Sections Please upload pictures of each lab as per defined sections. In Lab view, take 2 pictures of each lab. Picture should depict entire area. Please click pictures of different office areas from the diagonal corner of the room. Please click the pictures of all the Tools Above 10000 Please upload the pictures of the following sections Please click pictures of different facilities of Institute as per defined sections. In Safe drinking water, click picture of Water Vending Unit (RO, Water Purifier, Water dispenser etc.) Please click pictures of residential facility as per defined sections. Please click pictures of any two rooms of hostel facility. App is unable to get accurate location.
